title: Slow cooker shoulder of lamb with garlic and rosemary
ingredients: ['1 large carrot, roughly chopped', '1/2 large Spanish onion, sliced into rings', '1.7 to 2kg boned, rolled shoulder of lamb', '2 fat garlic cloves, cut into slivers', '2 to 3 sprigs fresh rosemary', 'olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground pepper', '500ml boiling water', 'For the gravy', '1 tablespoon redcurrant jelly', '1 tablespoon cornflour, mixed to a paste with water']
